description:
As Hibana and the others continue their investigation at St. Raffles Convent, someone unexpected appears.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Holy Mother of Darkness / The Knight King`s Great Adventure
La Religieuse de l’ombre / La grande aventure du Roi des chevaliers
Yami no Seibo / Kishi Ou no Daibouken
闇の聖母 / 騎士王の大冒険
